医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
PacBio 通过在 PacBio Compatible 中添加三级分析合作伙伴来实现罕见和遗传性疾病研究合作伙伴关系可最大限度地提高 HiFi 数据的价值，并为 PacBio 客户完成完整的端到端工作流程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/PacBio-enables-rare-and-inherited-disease-research-by-adding-tertiary-analysis-partners-to-PacBio-Compatible.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/PacBio-enables-rare-and-inherited-disease-research-by-adding-tertiary-analysis-partners-to-PacBio-Compatible.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa194437-8105-46b3-93a9-0d3d92fa773f Wed, 01 Nov 2023 10:08:00 -0400 PacBio enables rare and inherited disease research by adding tertiary analysis partners to PacBio Compatible
PacBio 推出 Kinnex RNA 试剂盒，进一步扩展全长 RNA、单细胞 RNA 和 16S rRNA 应用中的 HiFi 测序PacBio 今天宣布，它已开始接受其突破性的 Kinnex RNA 试剂盒的订单，该试剂盒提高了 PacBio 长读长测序系统上全长 RNA、单细胞 RNA 和 16S rRNA 测序的通量，从而能够以难以解决的分辨率进行大规模研究。通过短读长RNA测序来实现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/PacBio-announces-Kinnex-RNA-Kits-further-scaling-HiFi-Sequencing-in-Full-Length-RNA-Single-Cell-RNA-and- 16S-rRNA-applications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/PacBio-announces-Kinnex-RNA-Kits-further-scaling-HiFi-Sequencing-in-Full-Length-RNA-Single-Cell-RNA-and- 16S-rRNA-applications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=886b8870-0238-4f59-894c-638ec846cece Wed, 01 Nov 2023 10:05:00 -0400 PacBio announces Kinnex RNA Kits, further scaling HiFi Sequencing in Full-Length RNA, Single-Cell RNA and 16S rRNA applications
急性动脉粥样硬化性心肌梗死按组织损伤严重程度分期分类专家共识《加拿大心脏病学杂志》上发表的一份文件概述了加拿大心血管学会对急性心肌梗死的分类。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Expert-consensus-on-the-classification-of-acute-atherothrombotic-myocardial-infarction-by-stage-of-tissue-injury-severity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Expert-consensus-on-the-classification-of-acute-atherothrombotic-myocardial-infarction-by-stage-of-tissue-injury-severity.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fa4acbe-3d3c-4fd5-97e9-e3e6dcd362c3 Wed, 01 Nov 2023 09:40:00 -0400 Expert consensus on the classification of acute atherothrombotic myocardial infarction by stage of tissue injury severity
在早期药物发现活动的背景下开发人类偏好的机器学习评分函数在《自然通讯》最近发表的一项研究中，研究人员开发了一种基于人工智能的评分机制，用于早期药物发现活动，可用于化合物优先排序、主题合理化和有偏见的药物设计。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/The-development-of-a-machine-learned-scoring-function-of- human-preference-in-the-context-of-early-drug-发现活动.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/The-development-of-a-machine-learned-scoring-function-of- human-preference-in-the-context-of-early-drug- discovery-campaigns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d949f873-a954-4fdc-b40a-9a70604e43a8 Wed, 01 Nov 2023 09:15:00 -0400 The development of a machine-learned scoring function of human preference in the context of early drug discovery campaigns
概念验证研究有望提供更安全的基因治疗技术来治疗免疫缺陷研究人员描述了一种编辑重组激活基因 2 (RAG2) 位点以用于治疗应用的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Proof-of-concept-study-holds-promise-for-safer-gene-therapy-techniques-for-treating-immunodeficicies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Proof-of-concept-study-holds-promise-for-safer-gene-therapy-techniques-for-treating-immunodeficicies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=accecf0b-ebe9-4da5-b22f-67e23537e670 Wed, 01 Nov 2023 09:05:00 -0400 Proof-of-concept study holds promise for safer gene therapy techniques for treating immunodeficiencies
慢波睡眠的百分比是否会随着年龄的增长而下降，个体内部的下降是否与痴呆风险相关？研究人员调查了慢波睡眠（SWS）比例是否随着个体年龄的增长而减少，以及个体内部的减少是否与痴呆风险有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Does-the-percentage-of-slow-wave-sleep-decline-with-aging-and-are-intra-individual-declines-linked-with-痴呆风险.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Does-the-percentage-of-slow-wave-sleep-decline-with-aging-and-are-intra-individual-declines-linked-with-痴呆风险.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01619322-45f0-400d-80eb-fd46cef88b7b Wed, 01 Nov 2023 08:40:00 -0400 Does the percentage of slow-wave sleep decline with aging, and are intra-individual declines associated with dementia risk?
管理更年期：医疗保健从业者的 2023 年工具包修订后的 2023 年工具包的作者从 2014 年以来出现的关于更年期和相关病症的专业指南和立场以及共识声明中提取了关键建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Managing-menopause-The-2023-toolkit-for-healthcare-practitioners.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Managing-menopause-The-2023-toolkit-for-healthcare-practitioners.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c744a78e-035e-4c40-bfa3-c9f2c7c112dd Wed, 01 Nov 2023 07:50:00 -0400 Managing menopause: The 2023 toolkit for healthcare practitioners
切罗基保留地的医学院很快将向部落和农村地区派遣医生阿什顿·格洛弗·盖特伍德 (Ashton Glover Gatewood) 在了解到为像她这样的原住民学生设计的新校园后，决定再次尝试医学院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Medical-school-on-Cherokee-reservation-will-soon-send-doctors-to-tribal-rural-areas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Medical-school-on-Cherokee-reservation-will-soon-send-doctors-to-tribal-rural-areas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=491fb5f3-1bdf-4e12-89ea-1fb5035a43e9 Wed, 01 Nov 2023 07:43:14 -0400 Medical school on Cherokee reservation will soon send doctors to tribal, rural areas
州长候选人因赢得阿片类药物和解而争论不休阿片类药物结算现金本质上并不具有政治性。这不是国会通过法律的结果，也不是国家预算编辑的结果。这不是纳税人的钱。相反，它来自因处方止痛药加剧阿片类药物危机而被起诉的医疗保健公司。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Gubernatorial-candidates-quarrel-over-glory-for-looking-opioid-settlements.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Gubernatorial-candidates-quarrel-over-glory-for-looking-opioid-settlements.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a95b5ca-0dfa-4c79-a149-810679c6bd4e Wed, 01 Nov 2023 07:32:00 -0400 Gubernatorial candidates quarrel over glory for winning opioid settlements
